name: Aviansong Demo
description:
Please give your feedback here:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/19iu8E04tVto-04FWcCK_fzGjywpCXFu_MfAe_oOuaBw

Controls:

  • [Q] Lightning Song - Deals a small amount of damage to the closest enemy, and costs no mana
  • [W] Flame Song - Lobs a fiery note at the closest enemy, which explodes and deals a large amount of damage to enemies near its landing spot
  • [E] Healing Song - Heals all Avians for a moderate amount of health over a short period of time
  • [R] Bulwark Song - Blocks a large amount of damage over a short period of time

This is a proof-of-concept demo for Aviansong.

Content in the demo do not represent the final state of the gameplay elements, which are subject to change.

At the moment, it consists of only a crash-course tutorial of combat, and one boss fight.
